Upenyu hwangu nechitema, Hwafukwa nehwake kuchena
Zvironda zvechitema zvadzama, Zvakatsvuka, Mweya unotya
O kufukidzwa nemwi Jesu, Ndosunungurwa nemutemo
Ndoda kuziva rusununguro! Jesu ondipa nguwo chena
Ndaigashira, yangu ndarasa, Ndinopfeka upenyu hwenyu
Ndadzorerwa nerufo rwangu, Ndaruramiswa nemwi Tenzi
Ndaereswa neinzwi renyu, Ndozogashira mbiri yenyu
